actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the amount of dividends and interest which are excluded from gross income, and to make such exclusion permanent.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase to $1,500 ($2,500 in the case of a joint return) the amount of interest and dividend income which may be excluded from gross income. Provides an unlimited tax exclusion for individuals who are over 65.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the amount of dividends and interest which are excluded from gross income, and to make such exclusion permanent.
